website_summaries.verdict: Easy to use kit comes with everything you'll need.
pros: Kit includes balloon arch strip, glue dots, and a mix of different sized balloons
Flexible plastic strip can be formed into an arch or used as garland
Clear, easy to follow instructions also included
Multiple color schemes to choose from
cons: Kit sits at a slightly higher price point

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is gorgeous and so easy to put together! My husband and I blew up the balloons the night before my baby shower and out them in trash bags to take to the site. We put it together in about 30 minutes and didnt even use all of the balloons since it was full for how long we wanted it. It was absolutely beautiful and easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: BiblioLuvR

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: The balloons were easy to set up, but the large confetti ones kept popping on their own. Luckily I purchased two kits so I had more to spare. It looked beautiful for my baby's birthday party. I set everything up the day before. It took about half and hour to put the balloons together, using a fishing string and needle. Most stayed inflated for about 48 hrs. I have a backdrop stand for photography, so I taped the string and balloons to the poles. When it was time to bring it down, you can either go popping crazy, or stretch the bottom of each balloon to cut a small hole in it to deflate.
customer_reviews.author: Dkt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Ready to Pop” themed baby shower!
customer_reviews.text: I bought both the pink and gold kits and combined them for my sister’s baby shower. I thought it turned out great! The balloon tape and glue dots were sure easy to use! I made the mistake of blowing up the balloons Friday morning for a Sunday afternoon shower. Most of the big and medium balloons did fine, but over half the small balloons shriveled. Fortunately I hadn’t added them to the garland yet. So wait as long as you can for the small balloons. Overall it was very user friendly and really beautiful. JUNIBEL was a delight to work with as well. Would 100% buy from them again
customer_reviews.author: A. Ostrander

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not all the balloons inflate.
customer_reviews.text: The kit came with everything it had promised for: different sizes balloons packaged nicely in different little bags based on its size. I blew up the balloons with an automatic balloon pump to save time. The balloons are made up from a high quality material (the balloons feel stiff and sturdy, not thin and flimsy). None of the balloons popped that day. However, none of the small white ballons would inflate. I tried blowing, using helium tank, and my balloon pump and the balloon would not inflate at all.
customer_reviews.author: Eunike

customer_reviews.title: Turned out gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this!! I used it to create a nice backdrop for a bridal shower. I ordered this kit and a separate pack of rose gold balloons to match the color scheme for the shower. Blowing up the balloons was a little time consuming but other than that, putting this together was easy. It got so many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: E.N.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time making a balloon garland and this kit made it super easy! It took me and 2 friends about 2 hours to blow up all the balloons and place them how we wanted on the garland. We added a few 5” and 12” pink balloons & pink confetti balloons, as well as a couple 24” pink balloons! Overall love this product! Absolutely would recommend purchasing again! We made it about 30 hours before the event and they still looked great! I imagine they would’ve lasted even longer!
customer_reviews.author: TaylorRose

customer_reviews.title: Very easy and beautiful kit!
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need for a gorgeous balloon arch! Very long and I bought one extra pack of gold and glitter balloons to add for more volume and length. Takes a while to assemble (I’d say about 2 hrs) but is very worth it. I skipped the silvery colored balloons and added more gold ones! We got tons of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: EF

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Was used for a 50th bday party. Very satisfied with product. First time user of the arch. Give yourself some time to create. It's very tedious and requires patience to create. I enjoyed the finished product.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy K. E. Coates

customer_reviews.title: Balloons are metallic
customer_reviews.text: I did quite a bit research before going with Junibel, and I am so glad I did. It came everything you need in the kit. My main concern was the gold metallic balloons, I did read a lot of other products review that said the balloons weren’t metallic but this was the color I was looking for. It did come with gray balloons but I didn’t use them since the theme were gold and white, I did buy few more white balloons from party city to add. But overall extremely satisfied and would buy again. And shipping was super fast as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shreeza

customer_reviews.title: Show Stopper!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and a total hit! People said I should go into the biz when I seriously just followed the instructions. I bought two packages in different styles so I could make it in the colors I wanted. About 2hrs to put together with some help blowing up balloons. I recommend getting the air pump - I could not imagine blowing all of them up by mouth. Play around with how full you blow up the balloons too so it gives it more dimension but also you can fill gaps and such better.
customer_reviews.author: Beachamp_Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly. No balloon loss (I bought extra just in case based on others reviews) and they were true to color. You’ll see some yellowy balloons but those were from the extra purchase from a different maker. Had the whole thing ready to hang in under an hour but I did use an electric balloon pump (a MUST!!) which made it way easier. I did an arch a couple months ago and blowing up all those balloons by mouth was tedious and exhausting.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible!!! The instructions say you can blow them up overnight but it’s a lie!! We blew them up at 11am the day of my gender reveal just to insure that it would last the whole day and the arch didn’t even last until 2pm. They all popped and the confetti balloons were the first to go. I wish I could return all the pieces and get my money back. I was so excited about this package but couldn’t have been more disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: Junibel’s tips are a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is amazing!! I assembled one by myself which took about 3 hours including blowing up the balloons and it took about 1.5 hours with 3 people. Definitely watch the video and follow Junibel’s tips! Also, it is so easy to customize. I added some soft yellow balloons and paper flowers. It is a MUST to have a balloon pump which you can get the automatic one on amazon for $20. This is a lifesaver! Also suggest clear zip ties if you are mounting to staircase. Love love love and I cannot tell you how expensive it looked and how many people were shocked I made it.
customer_reviews.author: Lily J.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !
customer_reviews.text: Amazing balloons!!! Comes with everything you need in a kit and this is the best piece we had for our daughters 1st birthday. Easy to assemble and not one popped . I was a little afraid because it looks like you need to be a professional to put this together but the instructions we very easy and my husband and I did it in no time . It’s best to have a balloon inflator though .
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Vega

customer_reviews.title: Balloon Arch Kit for the win!
customer_reviews.text: This balloon arch kit was amazing! Very easy to set everything up! The longest part was blowing all the balloons up, but everything else was so simple! We got lots of compliments and the arch stayed up and beautiful several days after our event.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Fam

customer_reviews.title: For My Gift Table
customer_reviews.text: I used this garland for my gift table at my wedding. It was pretty easy to assemble and turned out beautifully!! I thought it might look cheap/cheesy but it was one of my favorite decor items I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy and cute!
customer_reviews.text: This balloon arch really pulled my party look together! I didn't even use helium just tied them up and still beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This arch looks great once its all put together! Although, I put the arch together the night prior to our event. And a lot of balloons popped. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Celia

customer_reviews.title: Still looked great eventhogh we were missing a piece.
customer_reviews.text: This looked lovely and I would highly recommend this to anyone. However, we were missing the plastic strip that you put the balloon into. It did take slightly longer than normal and a few balloons popped in the process. But it was great. We just used fishing wire to hang and attached the balloons together.
customer_reviews.author: inklover

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design and setup was easy but takes time. I recommend getting a balloon air machine to speed up the process.
customer_reviews.author: ivieli

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Easy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was one of my best purchases!!! I loved how easy creating the cascading ballon arch was with this product! I just added some black balloons for the event colors and it came out beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Kkayallday24/7

customer_reviews.title: FYI it does not come with balloon tape
customer_reviews.text: Product was perfect but we had to rush last minute to party city to grab balloon tape. without the balloon tape not possible to make an arch with items provided in bag. Other then that it was PERFECT .
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Worked out great!
customer_reviews.text: We loved it and only popped two balloons. Howeve, the instructions were a little vague and a picture would have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: You
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product . I recommend it 100 %. It comes with many different sizes of balloons . I used half of what I bought and I made a beautiful balloon garland for my event
customer_reviews.author: Luz

customer_reviews.title: Kit made making an arch so easy.
customer_reviews.text: Straight forward and easy instructions. All the tools you need to create a beautiful baloon arch! I loved that it came with a backbone to stick all of the balloons into, made it really easy to create the arch. The colors were very nice! Would defiantly buy again!
customer_reviews.author: David Yushchuk

customer_reviews.title: Get air pump
customer_reviews.text: Super simple to put together and looks awesome. Recommend using an electric balloon air pump to make the job fast and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Naperville552

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: The balloons look great!! however my package is missing the 60 glue dots and the 17' long ballon decorating strip
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and turned out get . Everything u need is in here. I will use this again , fun way to make the house look great for a party.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Display, Buy a Ballon Pump
customer_reviews.text: This was a wonderful addition to my party. Loved it and it's a great price. I implore buyers, however, to buy a balloon pump. I am not sure how long or how in the world this would have come together without a pump.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy Gaines

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Not a good value. I could've bought a bag of balloons for a much better price in a store.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Galloway

customer_reviews.title: Check balloons before blowing them up!
customer_reviews.text: Love the colours but was sadden to see that I was unable to use all my balloons for my arch because most of the balloons had tiny holes as soon as I open the package. My arch wasn't able to be full so i had to add stretch out the arch to make it look presentable for client gender reveal.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this for my sister's bridal party . Really recommend for parties for any occasion. Good quality looked amazing. Received many compliments
customer_reviews.author: marishka

customer_reviews.title: Used for Prom 2019
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous. Easy to assemble. Assembled balloons the night before. Recommend using a machine to blow-up balloons. Took about 40 min to blow them up with my daughter. Can't mess it up. Looks beautiful even for an amateur.
customer_reviews.author: ROBIN JONES

customer_reviews.title: Loved! Looks better in person!!
customer_reviews.text: Took a lot an hour with three people, highly suggested buying the air pump. The arch was easy to assemble and was beautiful. Greatly quality! The picture looked actually like that in person.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a baby shower! I put it together the day before and didn’t take it down for days! It was just so pretty. I used a balloon pump (just air not helium) which definitely made the process easier and faster.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Silpat

customer_reviews.title: some balloons do pop!
customer_reviews.text: beware that some balloons will pop. i wish that this came with at least a manual air pump because it takes a village to blow up these balloons without turning blue. **the glue dots do work! they stick!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful and easy!
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping a great price and so easy to put together! We did it the day off and didn’t even use all the balloons. I’ve shared this with everyone because I love how it came out!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bpadron

customer_reviews.title: Great product - beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Wow- this came with so many balloons and detailed instructions. I received two emails thanking me for my purchase and offering tips on set up. Very easy to assemble and high quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective balloon tape
customer_reviews.text: I blew up all the balloons and then found out that my balloon tape has no holes in it! So now I have to run out and purchase one somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: The ballons were picture perfect. The kit was so easy to use. I’m still impressed
customer_reviews.author: michelle watson

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful addition to any celebration!
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need comes in one package and is easy to assemble- took about 2 hours. There was a strange taste when blowing up the balloons, will be purchasing an air pump next time!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great balloon quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gave so much character to our backdrop for out photobooth baby shower event. I blew up balloons the night before event and it was great. About 3 balloons did have holes but that was no big deal. Made no difference. Easy to put together. Our client & her guests loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Marivel Z

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to set up. The instructions were very thorough. The product was very good quality. I will definitely buy another set!
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof1

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: Balloons were good quality, did not pop when slightly over inflated. There were several sizes included, was easy to make and looked great !
customer_reviews.author: M.K

customer_reviews.title: do not put outsoors
customer_reviews.text: I loved it once i put it together and I put it outside which was a bad idea i wish I would have been forwarned
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very striking decoration
customer_reviews.text: So pretty put together! Used for bridal shower. Definitely appreciated the dollar shore purchase hand pump to blow all those balloons up.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Westfall

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: So simple to put together and the best part that it comes with everything u need! We added baby blue to ours so you cam definitely customize it even more. We did but a pump to make it easier so definitely recommend using an electric air pump we got ours here on amazon for about 24 bucks
customer_reviews.author: JOHNNY GARCIA

customer_reviews.title: Looks AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: The balloon arch is BIG. It was a little difficult to assemble but not rocket science. It comes with everything you need. The arch looks amazing and has all different size balloons. For the price, the final look, I will definitely buy this again for future parties.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy M.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! Looks amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: 100% buy it. Was amazing for our party! Heads up on the balloons w/ confetti in them. Don’t blow up too big. Pop very easily! Bought the Champaign balloon separate
customer_reviews.author: Andrew W.

customer_reviews.title: Great DIY piece for any special event!
customer_reviews.text: Was great. As described and turned out as a great feature piece to our new shop unveiling and soft opening
customer_reviews.author: Tuss

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunatly we got into our venue late and didn’t have time to put the whole arch together, but it still served its purpose, looked great even unfinished and everyone loved it!
customer_reviews.author: abbhar1

customer_reviews.title: Blow balloons up in different sizes
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that the balloons had a rich color which made the party decoration pop. Our guest were just amazed.
customer_reviews.author: Matilda

customer_reviews.title: Hard to hang up
customer_reviews.text: This was very hard to hang. It was very heavy and kept falling. It was very pretty but a waste when it wouldn’t stay up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It was extremely easy to assemble and great value for your money. Colors were vibrant!
customer_reviews.author: Margarita Garcia.

customer_reviews.title: Greatness!
customer_reviews.text: My balloon arch was a hit! Highly recommend this product! The package comes with everything you’ll need to build a beautiful arch. I added the animal print and black balloons to fit my theme.
customer_reviews.author: A.T.

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Got here really fast . Haven't used it yet but everything it said it has is in the kit looks beautiful can't wait to use it
customer_reviews.author: consepcion

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: Really simple assembly and the balloons looked just like online! I would definitely use this company again!
customer_reviews.author: Telicia

customer_reviews.title: It was a great asset to the party.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my daughters to use for bridal shower. They didn’t seem to have any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Save money!
customer_reviews.text: All you need to make your own balloon garlands. Easy to make.
customer_reviews.author: TMar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Champagne-themed Party
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with how this garland turned out. I had a vision and I was able to adapt it to make it work. I loved that there was a range of sizes as this gave the effect of champagne bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Crompton

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It was extremely easy to put together, everything needed was provided.
customer_reviews.author: marianna manoukian

customer_reviews.title: impressed!!!!
customer_reviews.text: great and easy to use!! Great product will be getting again :)
customer_reviews.author: Nelson A Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Easier than you think to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this. Added some pops of blue in the garland it came out beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Took about a 1hour to make
customer_reviews.text: Loved how easy it was to assemble and make!!! Everyone loved how pretty it made my background look!
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Easy kit, all you need!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, loved the kit & turned out amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: It was awesome and lasted for so long, it was too pretty to pop right away
customer_reviews.author: Esmeralda Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Really easy I recommend taking the chain up horizontally so it’s easier on your back to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Easier than it looks!!
customer_reviews.text: Overall had an incredible experience with this seller. They sent a very helpful email with instructions and tips for how to assemble! There is also a helpful you Tube video i four under their seller name with tips on how to assemble. Honestly - the kit is soooo easy. We blew up the balloons the night before, put them in extra large garbage bags to transport to our venue. Once at the event location it too us about 45 mins to assemble and another 15 minutes or so to hang up in the proper location. I will be purchasing again for future events.
customer_reviews.author: Holland

customer_reviews.title: Easier than it looks!
customer_reviews.text: I had my hesitations about assembling this, but after reading other reviews I decided to give it a shot. The end product was great! Many guests asked where I purchased this :) definitely worth investing in an electric pump. Assembly took me about an hour start to finish. The only problem I encountered was that the confetti balloons seemed a bit thin (especially compared to the other balloons) and a few popped, so I ended up not using these. I had about 10 balloons leftover. Be careful not to overfill the balloons and you’ll be just fine. Would definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: mturco

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Touch
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect addition to my event loved the outcome was easy to put together and using glue dots was key.
customer_reviews.author: Serge Olivier

customer_reviews.title: Great balloons
customer_reviews.text: The balloons are of great quality. They stayed blown up for days!! The instructions were sub par, I was still confused. Lol Would purchase again, as the quality of balloons was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase! You won't regret it. Envy of all your friends. 💖
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, BEAUTIFUL, elegant decoration for a party. Definitely gave my guests inspiration for their future party decor. Totally upped the game with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer  Brown

customer_reviews.title: SO EASY!
customer_reviews.text: This product was worth every penny. It didn't take long to make. We added another color of balloons that came separately. I will definitely go this route again.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. O

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The garland turned out better than I could have hoped. It helped that I purchased an electric air pump. Give yourself time and space to be creative!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I used this at my baby shower and got a lot of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: SuVar6as

product_meta.title: Junibel Balloon Arch & Garland Kit | Pearl White, Chrome Gold Confetti & Silver | Glue Dots | Decorating Strip | Holiday, Wedding, Baby Shower, Graduation, Anniversary Organic DIY Party Decorations
feature_bullets: ✅ ANY EVENT - Perfect for baby showers, weddings, graduations, anniversaries, corporate events, engagements, BBQs, photo shoots and more!
✅ EASY ASSEMBLY - Easily create a show stopping balloon masterpiece at any of your celebrations! TIP - make it BIGGER by ordering 2 or more!
✅ CAREFULLY CRAFTED - Mini balloons to jumbo size balloons in an assortment of coordinating colours!
✅ ANYWHERE - Hang it up, suspend it, drape it as a party backdrop. Adds the "wow" factor to any event!
✅ SIMPLE INSTRUCTIONS INCLUDED - We've taken the guess work out. Get your party started now! IMPORTANT: Make sure you're opted in for seller communication to receive our PRO SETUP tips!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars183 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
